summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BluBridge HRMS system. Backend API testing achieved 91.3% success rate with minor ObjectId serialization issues. Frontend testing achieved 100% success rate with all pages, navigation, forms, and interactive features working correctly.

flaky_endpoints.issue: POST returns 520 Internal Server Error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization
POST returns 520 Internal Server Error due to MongoDB ObjectId serialization

passed_tests: Dashboard page with stats cards and attendance data
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Attendance, Leave, Star Reward, Team, Reports)
Attendance page with filters, sorting, and data display
Leave Management with tabs (Leave Request, Leave History)
Star Reward page with employee cards, view/add functionality, CSV export
Team Dashboard with department tabs and team cards
Reports page with attendance/leave report generation
Interactive features: filters, modals, forms, buttons
Background colors and UI styling (#efede5 global, #fffdf7 containers)
Backend APIs: authentication, dashboard stats, employees (GET), attendance, star rewards, teams, departments, reports, audit logs
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix MongoDB ObjectId serialization issues in employee and leave creation endpoints. The error occurs because FastAPI cannot serialize MongoDB ObjectIds to JSON. Consider using string UUIDs instead of ObjectIds or implement proper serialization.
